attributes.review: This app took almost 2 WHOLE WEEKS just to download, and every time I tried to open it the screen would violently flash a nasty bright orange color. Before I even got a chance to delete the app I received dozens of emails from who I assume to be trump supporters saying that if I don’t give a good review then they were gonna send me and my family back to Mexico 👁👄👁
attributes.title: Absolutely appalling

attributes.review: I was so excited to support the organic orange! Then I downloaded the app and wow I was so disappointed! When I opened the app this Big headed orange popped up on the screen and scared the crap out of me! I accidentally threw my phone across the room and injured my wall so there for I am suing! My wall needs to be fixed don’t you know my wall has feelings too!!!! Gezz this is so ridiculous!! I can’t believe this app!!
attributes.title: Ew!

attributes.review: Let’s start off how bad this app is. It took about 6 and a half hours to download this app its unbelievable. Trump shouldn’t have an app all to himself because no other president has had his/her own app. It takes forever to load and makes my phone slow when it’s loading. It glitches out when I try to use it. This app shouldn’t be a thing!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.review: worst app ever. When i first open the app i see an orange. AN ORANGE! can you believe that. unacceptable i hate it. i would like assure your that this app is the worst app i’ve ever downloaded and that you should not get it. 1 star ofc. Like who wants to see a wrinkly orange. definitely not me and 𝔁𝓾𝓮🥶𝓱𝓾𝓪🧚‍♀️𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸😻𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸🗿𝓫𝓮𝓲👺𝓯𝓮𝓷𝓰🤩𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸😼𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸👣 🔫🔫👽👽✨this app makes me mad like i can’t even open it i swear 😤

attributes.review: Love this app! Has been doing so much to help make everything great again. Will definitely use again 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼 #trump2020
attributes.title: Best App in the History of the US

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what all the fuss was about this orange man that is president. I have to say I was utterly disappointed I expected a lot more since all these boomers, Karen’s, and Bobs talk it up so much. The app immediately started crashing and the screen kept going black, it glitches out my whole phone and I have to restart it. DO NOT GET HIS APP NOT WORTH YOUR TIME OR EFFORT (have a lovely day everyone ✨☺️)
attributes.title: R: _apist or _acist

attributes.review: this app glitched because it sensed i was for basic human rights✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿🏳️‍🌈👩‍❤️‍👨👩‍❤️‍👩👨‍❤️‍👨and cheeto dust🐱 came from the speakers🔊 and covered my phone📱 . it then showed the most horrific picture of an orange🍊 man pointing👉🏽. when i was little, my mom👩‍👧 told me pointing was disrespectful. so in turn, this picture made me feel disrespected🤦🏾‍♀️. i leave the app store ashamed😓 and scared😖. this app is NOT worth anyone’s time🕐🕑🕒🕓🕕.
attributes.title: there’s cheeto dust on my phone...

attributes.review: they need to remove it because it was glitching and orange faces keep appearing on the screen which can hurt your eyes and hopefully I don’t lose my sight😰 he wants everyone who is of color or ethnicity to leave the country but doesn't have the audacity to pay for my trip back, how rude right and the orange character is makeing me really uncomfortable... THiS ApP iS NOT FOR KIDS‼️‼️‼️
attributes.title: This app is not expectable...TeRRible 🙈🤡☹️😒

attributes.review: As soon as I got the app it asked me what race I was, as soon as I put in my race it kicked me out 🙄 all because I wasn’t white. The person who made this app obviously supports white supremacy. It had also asked me for my families location and when I didn’t feel comfortable typing their location in the app started victimizing itself. Don’t get this app it’s horrible 😡
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: For some reason, the downloading process took several days. After the fact, my phone froze and deleted several of my apps and important information and installed new apps which would open up 20+ links in my Safari and installed viruses. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND. If Apple doesn’t take this down, they could be held liable for all the damages.
attributes.title: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
